<MemberDefinition

  labels = {["inline"]}>
Try to infer branch probabilities mimicking implementation of <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/branchprobabilityinfo">BranchProbabilityInfo</a>.

Unlikely taken branches are marked so that the inference algorithm can avoid sending flow along corresponding edges.

Definition at line <a href="/docs/api/files/include/include/llvm/include/llvm/transforms/include/llvm/transforms/utils/sampleprofileinference-h/#l00146">146</a> of file <a href="/docs/api/files/include/include/llvm/include/llvm/transforms/include/llvm/transforms/utils/sampleprofileinference-h">SampleProfileInference.h</a>.
